dcterms:description: Camelyon16 is a public dataset for detection of metastasis in breast cancer. It consists of 271 training and 129 test whole slide images (WSI), divided into approximately 0.25 million patches at 5Ã— magnification. Each WSI is paired with pixel-level annotations indicating the position of tumors.
dcterms:title: Camelyon16

dcterms:description: TCGA-LUAD is a dataset from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) for Lung Adenocarcinoma (LUAD). It consists of 800 tumorous frozen whole-slide histopathology images and the corresponding genetic mutation status, with a focus on detecting four mutations important for treatment options.
dcterms:title: TCGA-LUAD

dcterms:description: The Breast Ultrasound Dataset contains 28,914 B-mode breast ultrasound exams, with the task of detecting breast cancer. Each exam contains between 4-70 images, and only bag-level labels indicating the presence of cancer are available.
dcterms:title: Breast Ultrasound Dataset
